DESCRIPTION: Easily change the nickname of a member on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}nick [Nickname] [@User]** ~ Change another members nickname if you have the mod/admin perms.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}nick [@User]** ~ Reset another members nickname if you have the mod/admin perms..
ALIASES: Nick does not have any aliases.
USER_TOO_LOW: Your highest role is not high enough to edit this member's nickname.
BOT_TOO_LOW: The bots role is not high enough to edit this member's nickname.
EDITED_SELF: You have successfully changed your nickname.
RESET: You have successfully reset your nickname.
NEED_NICK_PERMS: I need manage nickname permission to run this command on this server. Please contact a mod/admin to update my permissions.
